maqras.text: Vi ricev news de feuding hom hav sneaked his sanctuary
When ili entered his cxambr li startled Ili dir ne Hav tim! Ni feuding 1 another ni streb your foir judgment Ne wrong us direkt us dekstr path
This frat de min owns 90 9 sxaf while mi own unu sxaf. Li wants miks my sxaf his ad pressure me

Li dir Li est unfair al vi per pet kombin your sxaf his! Plej popol kombin their properties trakt each ali unfairly those kred work righteousness these est few Afterwards David wondered se li far dekstr judgment Li opini ni testing him. Li tiam implored his Lord forgiveness bowed down pent
Ni forgave him en this materi Ni granted him pozici honor us bel abode
O David ni far vi ruler ter. Do vi jugx among des popol equitably ne sekv your personal opinion lest gxi diverts vi voj DI! Surely those stray voj DI incur severe retribution forges Tag Reckoning
Ni ne kre heaven ter cxio them en vain Such est des opini da those disbelieve! Do ve al those disbelieve; ili sufer Infer
Ni trakt those kred plumb righteous life as ni trakt those commit evil ter? Ni trakt righteous as ni trakt des wicked
This est scripture ni send down vi est sankt - perhaps ili reflect its vers. Those posed intelligence pren heed
Al David ni granted Solomon; bon obedient servant
tag li igx preoccupied bel cxeval nokt fal
Li tiam dir mi gxu sxtof ajx plur than mi gxu worshipping my Lord sun est ir
Bring them dors. bid farewell li frot their krur kol
Ni tiel put Solomon test ni ben him vast sxtof wealth li steadfastly submitted
Li dir My Lord forgive me grant me kingship neniam ating per anyone aux Vi est Grantor
Ni (respond his prayer committed vent his disposal versx pluv wherever li wanted)
Diabl mason diving
Others ej his disposal
This est our provision vi; vi don generously withhold lim
Li ind honorable pozici us wonderful abode
Memor our servant Job li vok his Lord diabl aflikt me hardship pain
Strik muel your fut! printemp vol don vi healing drink
Ni restored his famili por him; twice as many Such est our mercy; reminder those posed intelligence
Tuj vi vojagx land predik message fulfill your pledge Ni trov him steadfast. Ki bon servant! Li est submitter
memor ankaux our servants Abraham Isaac Jacob. Ili est resourceful posed vizi
Ni bestowed them great ben awareness Hereafter
Ili chosen ili est among plej righteous
Memor Ismail Elisha Zal-Kifl; among plej righteous
This est reminder righteous ind wonderful destiny
Gxarden Eden vol open up their gates them
Relaxing therein ili don many kinds de frukt drink
